TopicTitle: They're NASA and they know it

Articles.Content: I gave up on trying to embed the video, sorry

No worries.

Very funny video indeed! I would even say it's better than the original

I would say it's definitely better than the original, but that's just my taste in music

Semi-related, can anyone show me how to embed that? I was looking/copying right off the forum documentation for embedding videos, but all it gave me was a youtube video box with no content D:
Hmmm, if you click the Insert Video button on above the text box, you should see a pop up letting you put the video's url in it, then it'll embed.
I don't seem to have that option :l hm oh well I'll figure it out eventually
Ydoow, it should be in the advanced editor, click "Go Advanced" below the text box.

Simply use: [video.] , just remove the period it should work.

Edited August 18, 2012 by GOOMH
Yup it does!

Ydoow, it should be in the advanced editor, click "Go Advanced" below the text box.

That's where I was looking. Above this text box I don't have any options to insert video, links, or images. Below I can add attachments, but that's all.

GOOMH...shutup...lol

I don't know how I didn't try the most obvious combination.

I guess I just thought I hard already tried it at some point

I was gonna post this!

This is so awesome.
